parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: DBStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the database. Valid values:

*   **Creating**
*   **Running**
*   **Deleting**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Pages start from 1.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: 30.
